title: Help Pixel 3 rear camera hardware issue. Repaird under warranty but faulty next day after repair
content:
Hi all,

My relative from US gifted me a pixel 3, 5 months back and i live in india.
But early this October(after 4 months  of use) its rear camera video started to flicker, stabilisation not working and started to give a haptic feedback.

I received repaired device on 29 th (req raised on 2nd) And as per the service report there is no issue in hardware there was a loss connection which the reconnected.

But when i turned on and check my repaired device on the same day it again shows the stabilisation issue same with the rear camera.
And now again when i contacted them they are telling  they will raise a ticket and again it will be picked and repaired again...

Repair after repair, I am not ready to try repairing again, Kindly help what will i do.
